body_html:
I think its a bad idea.
Old checkpoints will not load properly, this has the potential to break a bunch of saved models on all file systems, just to make file-systems with non case sensitive naming be more friendly with a particular use case.

body:
I think its a bad idea.
Old checkpoints will not load properly, this has the potential to break a bunch of saved models on all file systems, just to make file-systems with non case sensitive naming be more friendly with a particular use case.
